resources.string: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or take advise from FintechAdvise.
FintechAdvise takes data protection and user privacy seriously, implementing a robust framework to ensure the security of sensitive information.
FintechAdvise employs a robust data protection policy centered around AES 256 encryption, TLS protocols, and Azure servers.

string-array.name: risk_levels
string-array.item: I am willing to take on some risk .
I am comfortable with high risk.

string-array.name: financial_stability_levels
string-array.item: I have a stable income and no debt.
I have a stable income and minimal debt.
I have a stable income and moderate debt.
I have a stable income and high debt.
I have an unstable income and minimal debt.
I have an unstable income and high debt.
